name: List
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List
description: Job::List is a special case Array with additional values.

methods.name: token
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List#token
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: token=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List#token=
methods.description: If not empty, indicates that there are more records that match the request and this value should be passed to continue.

methods.name: etag
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List#etag
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: etag=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List#etag=
methods.description: A hash of this page of results.

methods.name: total
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List#total
methods.description: Total number of jobs in this collection.

methods.name: total=
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List#total=
methods.description: Total number of jobs in this collection.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List#next?
methods.description: Whether there is a next page of jobs.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

jobs = bigquery.jobs
if jobs.next?
  next_jobs = jobs.next
end

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

jobs = bigquery.jobs
if jobs.next?
  next_jobs = jobs.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Bigquery
Job
List#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all jobs by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Calls the given block once for each job, which is passed as the parameter.

An Enumerator is returned if no block is given.

This method may make several API calls until all jobs are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.caption: Iterating each job by passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

bigquery.jobs.all do |job|
  puts job.state
end

examples.caption: Using the enumerator by not passing a block:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

all_states = bigquery.jobs.all.map do |job|
  job.state
end

examples.caption: Limit the number of API calls made:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
bigquery = gcloud.bigquery

bigquery.jobs.all(request_limit: 10) do |job|
  puts job.state
end

params.name: request_limit
params.description:
The upper limit of API requests to make
to load all jobs. Default is no limit.

params.name: yield
params.description: The block for accessing each job.
